SELECT NEWS.TITLE AS TITLE, NEWS.IMAGEURL AS IMAGEURL, SUBSTRING(NEWS.PUBDATE,1,16) AS PUBDATE, NEWS.LINKURL AS LINKURL , NEWS.DESCRIPTCONTEXT AS DESCRIPTCONTEXT FROM MORNING_NEWS_RESOURCE_TABLE NEWS WHERE 1=1 AND NEWS.NEWSFLAG = 'CHINA' ORDER BY NEWS.PUBDATE DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MORNING_NEWS_RESOURCE_TABLE NEWS WHERE 1=1 AND NEWS.NEWSFLAG = 'CHINA'
